description: Additional funding totalling tens of millions of pounds for health care in Grampian, Orkney and Shetland is announced.
title: Extra NHS Grampian, Orkney and Shetland funds announced
title_page: Extra NHS Grampian, Orkney and Shetland funds announced - BBC News
maintext:
On a quest to get home, a night of fun becomes a dangerous battle...
Celebs welcome Alison Hammond for a sleepover
